Zend_Gdata  
Gapps  
No 
No 

Description

Assists in constructing queries for Google Apps email list entries.

Instances of this class can be provided in many places where a URL is required.

For information on submitting queries to a server, see the Google Apps service class, Zend_Gdata_Gapps.


Methods

__construct, getEmailListName, getQueryUrl, getRecipient, getStartEmailListName, setEmailListName, setRecipient, setStartEmailListName,

__construct( string   $domain = null, string   $emailListName = null, string   $recipient = null, string   $startEmailListName = null, ) : n/a

Description

Create a new instance.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$domain string | (optional) The Google Apps-hosted domain to use when constructing query URIs. null
$emailListName string | (optional) Value for the emailListName property. null
$recipient string | (optional) Value for the recipient property. null
$startEmailListName string | (optional) Value for the startEmailListName property. null

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a

getEmailListName( ) : string

Description

Get the email list name to query for. If no name is set, null will be returned.

Return value

Type Description
string The email list name to filter search results by, or null if disabled.

Tags

Name Description
see setEmailListName

getQueryUrl( ) : string

Description

Returns the URL generated for this query, based on it's current parameters.

Return value

Type Description
string A URL generated based on the state of this query.

Tags

Name Description
throws Zend_Gdata_App_InvalidArgumentException

getRecipient( ) : string

Description

Get the recipient email address to query for. If no recipient is set, null will be returned.

Return value

Type Description
string The recipient email address to filter search results by, or null if disabled.

Tags

Name Description
see setRecipient

getStartEmailListName( ) : string

Description

Get the first email list which should be displayed when retrieving a list of email lists.

Return value

Type Description
string The first email list to be returned, or null to disable.

setEmailListName( string   $value, ) : n/a

Description

Set the email list name to query for. When set, only lists with a name matching this value will be returned in search results. Set to null to disable filtering by list name.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$value string | The email list name to filter search results by, or null to disable.

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a

setRecipient( string   $value, ) : n/a

Description

Set the recipient to query for. When set, only subscribers with an email address matching this value will be returned in search results.

Set to null to disable filtering by username.


Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$value string | The recipient email address to filter search results by, or null to disable.

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a

setStartEmailListName( string   $value, ) : n/a

Description

Set the first email list which should be displayed when retrieving a list of email lists.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$value string | The first email list to be returned, or null to disable.

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a

$_emailListName,

  protected  $_emailListName = null

A string which, if not null, indicates which email list should be retrieved by this query.string
